外观模式

发布于：2020-01-14 00:00   标签分类： 设计模式

为复杂的模块或子系统提供一个外界访问的接口，客户调用接口，而不用管如何调用复杂的子系统

<?php
class Facade
{
    private $subSystemA;
    private $subSystemB;
    private $subSystemC;
    public function __construct()
    {
        $this->subSystemA = new SubSystemA();
        $this->subSystemB = new SubSystemB();
        $this->subSystemC = new SubSystemC();
    }

    public function doSome()
    {
        $this->subSystemA->doSomeA();
        $this->subSystemB->doSomeB();
    }

    public function doOther()
    {
        $this->subSystemA->doSomeA();
        $this->subSystemC->doSomeC();
    }
}

class SubSystemA
{
    public function doSomeA()
    {
        echo "做什么复杂事情XXX".PHP_EOL;
    }
}

class SubSystemB
{
    public function doSomeB()
    {
        echo "做什么复杂事情YYY".PHP_EOL;
    }
}

class SubSystemC
{
    public function doSomeC()
    {
        echo "做什么复杂事情ZZZ".PHP_EOL;
    }
}


$facade = new Facade();
$facade->doSome();
$facade->doOther();
